Moon Al-mi'raj.name: Moon Al-mi'raj

baseData.description:
Storm.
At the end of your turn, fully restore this follower's defense.
baseData.flair: A bad bunny rabbit expelled from heaven for rebelling against her heavenly counterparts. Down on earth, Moon Al-mi'raj bathes in the light of the full moon and scoffs at the fate that has befallen her.

evoData.description:
Storm.
At the end of your turn, fully restore this follower's defense.
evoData.flair: The more that Moon Al-mi'raj learned about magic from the moon, the more she came to detest its celestial presence, like a young girl driven half mad by her first love.

Spirit Cycle.name: Spirit Cycle

baseData.description:
Countdown (2)
At the end of your turn, draw a card.
Whenever you use Necromancy, add 1 to this amulet's Countdown.
baseData.flair: A life is never truly wasted. It can be recycled over and over.

Call of Cocytus.name: Call of Cocytus

baseData.description:
Destroy an enemy follower.
Enhance (8): Then put a Servant of Darkness into your hand.
baseData.flair: This power freezes teardrops and screams alike.
